name: Corn O'Brien for 100
keywords: bacon, corn, pimento, side dish, spring, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 3/4 cup canned pimentos, drained and finely chopped
1 1/4 cups melted shortening or salad oil

recipeInstructions.text: Cook bacon until crisp. Set aside.
Drain corn; mix with salt, pepper and pimentos. Saute peppers and onions in shortening until tender. Add to corn mixture.
Cook corn mixture over medium heat until hot, stirring constantly.
Crumble bacon. Add to corn mixture. Mix well.
